Articles.Content: Somehow it started thinking of this, i really think we should get caterpillars in game, they would have great torque and would be able to climb extreme hills. They would be pretty slow though. Maybe for creating them in the VAB/SPH you could use something like the struts: you give a first point and a last one and the game spawns a track inbetween! What do you think of this? Cuz it sounds awesome to me!

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/caterpillar-tracks/

Might be something for you. I am unsure if it works with 0.22, I have not tried the mod for a few months

Must try that thing out

Edited November 24, 2013 by panzerknoef
